ape rajayak thula palamu karyabharaya wanne rate purna aarakshawak thahawuru kirima wana bawada gotabhaya mahatha mehidi pawasiya.yalith lankawa lokaye surakshithama rata bawata path kala haki bawa itha wishwasayen pawasana bawath, dudaruwange aarakshawa thama bara ganna bawath ohu wadiduratath kiya sitiyeya.wiwidha aagam adahana pudgalayin sitina bawath, ekinekage sanskruthiyata garu kala pirisak bawath, apage shakthiya wiya yuththe eya bawada pawasiya.

nithipathiwaraya wenas karanawa ha samanawa ho eetath wada awashya wanne, nithipathi departhamenthuwa, deshapalanikaranaya nowu, apakshapathi ha karyakshama swadhina aayathanayak bawata path kirima, ba`dawa ganim sidu kirimata nisi pa්ramithiyak sakasima, nithignyawarun athulu niladharin pa්ramanaya wadi kirima, thakshanika dharithawayan, hakiyawan saha kusalathawayan wardhanaya kirima, janathawata pahasuwen la`ga wiya haki saha paradrushya aayathanayak bawata path kirima, wagawime ki්rayawaliyak sthapitha kirima bawa ehidi pa්rakasha wiya.
